pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Additive Regression Trees // Bayesian Additive Regression Trees (BART) provide flexible nonparametric modeling of covariates for continuous, binary, categorical and time-to- event outcomes. For more information on BART, see Chipman, George and McCulloch (2010) doi:10.1214/09-AOAS285 and Sparapani, Logan, McCulloch and Laud (2016) doi:10.1002/sim.6893.
